lead_paragraph: Russian heavyweight Alexander Povetkin has been suspended indefinitely and fined $250,000 by the World Boxing Council in a doping case.
snippet: Russian heavyweight Alexander Povetkin has been suspended indefinitely and fined $250,000 by the World Boxing Council in a doping case....

headline.main: WBC Hands Povetkin Suspension, $250,000 Fine in Doping Case
headline.print_headline: WBC Hands Povetkin Suspension, $250,000 Fine in Doping Case
